name: docs4ai
description: Cross-platform folder sync app with sqlite-vec for vector search

scripts.start: npm run rebuild:electron && npm run build && electron .
scripts.package:win:docker: docker run --rm -t --user "$(id -u)":"$(id -g)" -e HOME=/project/.home -e WINEPREFIX=/project/.wine -e npm_config_cache=/project/.npm-cache --tmpfs /project/node_modules:uid=$(id -u),gid=$(id -g),mode=755,exec -v "$PWD":/project -w /project -v "$HOME/.cache/electron":/root/.cache/electron -v "$HOME/.cache/electron-builder":/root/.cache/electron-builder electronuserland/builder:20-wine-mono-03.25 bash -lc "mkdir -p /project/.home /project/.wine /project/.npm-cache && if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then cp package-lock.json package-lock.linux.json; fi && if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci --ignore-scripts; else npm install --ignore-scripts; fi && export npm_config_platform=win32 npm_config_arch=x64 && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-save --force sqlite-vec-windows-x64@0.1.7-alpha.2 && NLC_VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./node_modules/node-llama-cpp/package.json").version') && npm install --no-save --ignore-scripts --force --os=win32 --cpu=x64 "@node-llama-cpp/win-x64@${NLC_VERSION}" && npm run build && npx electron-builder install-app-deps --platform win32 --arch x64 && npx electron-builder --win"
scripts.fix:linux-permissions: sudo chown -R "$USER":"$USER" node_modules dist release && rm -rf node_modules/better-sqlite3/build
scripts.test: npm run rebuild:node && npm run build && jest
scripts.test:watch: npm run rebuild:node && npm run build && jest --watch
scripts.test:coverage: npm run rebuild:node && npm run build && jest --coverage
